long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO CENTER Extension is SEO checker: On-page, word count, heading, alt text, image size, internal link, external link and more. These extensions will help you manage and optimize SEO more easily.

Features include:
1. Check meta data
ðŸ”Ž Check title and its length characters.
ðŸ”Ž Check description and its length characters.
ðŸ”Ž Check the language.
ðŸ”Ž Displaying site name
ðŸ”Ž Displaying Robots tag
ðŸ”Ž URL and canonical url
ðŸ”Ž Check file robots.txt and sitemap 1 click

2. Check your headers
ðŸ”Ž Displaying headers (H1, H2, H3, H4, H5 and H6).
ðŸ”Ž Quick copy heading feature.

3. Check the images and links on the page
ðŸ”Ž Check the image alt attribute
ðŸ”Ž Count the number with and without alt
ðŸ”Ž Check each image size.
ðŸ”Ž Check images via URL.

4. Internal link and External link
ðŸ”Ž Statistics on the number of links.
ðŸ”Ž List anchor text and corresponding url.
ðŸ”Ž Classify links as dofollow or nofollow
ðŸ”Ž Convenient link filter

5. Nofollow Link Highlight: 
ðŸ”Ž Easily spot nofollow links on any webpage with a red dashed border. This visual cue helps quickly identify links that do not contribute to SEO ranking.

6. SERP Counter:
ðŸ”Ž View ranking positions directly on Google search results. This feature displays ranking numbers beside each result, allowing you to quickly track the position of your pages in the SERP and monitor competitors.
